question_id: Hitung jumlah masakan aktif dan tidak aktif. Tampilkan status_aktif (0 atau 1) beserta total masakannya.
sql_query:
SELECT
  COUNT(m.kode_masakan) AS total_masakan_aktif,
  SUM(CASE WHEN m.status_aktif = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_masakan_aktif,
  SUM(CASE WHEN m.status_aktif = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_masakan_tidak_aktif
FROM Masakan m
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  COUNT(m.kode_masakan) AS total_masakan_aktif,
  SUM(CASE WHEN m.status_aktif = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_masakan_aktif,
  SUM(CASE WHEN m.status_aktif = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_masakan_tidak_aktif
FROM Masakan m;
```
